intros.
apply raft_net_invariant' with (P := client_cache_keys_correct).

- apply raft_net_invariant_request_vote'.

- apply raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server'.
- apply raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset.
- apply raft_net_invariant_reboot'.
- assumption.
Qed.
